text: Bought some liverwurst and it's absolutely amazing. Very friendly place, honest, and delicious sausages. Everything is made by the owner so you know the ingredients. No chemicals added. Best place in the market for home made sausages.

Absolutely authentic German sausage of all types. Tubular delights that range from all kinds of brats, garlic sausage, mettwurst, landjaeger, weisswurst... you get the idea. They also make some of the best veal and pork pates you can find anywhere, and they have authentic German cold cuts. They'll also make stuff to order if you ask ahead of time. Wonderful place.
The best in Cleveland have to visit everytime i'm in town.
